product_name: Sunlite Trailer Tot Bike Trailer - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Featuring a durable powder-coated alloy frame and a fully enclosed canopy with windows, this lightweight bike trailer lets your young ones enjoy leisurely bike rides safely and comfortably.
